scripts.patch-package: cd app && rm -f ../moba-package-backup.json && cp package.json ../moba-package-backup.json && patch -i ../package.diff
scripts.create-patched-src: rm -rf src/modified && rm -rf src/original && cp -R app/electron-src src/original && cp -R app/electron-src src/modified && cd src/modified && patch -p1 -i ../../patch.diff
scripts.generate-patches: cd src && diff -raN -U 6 original modified > ../patch.diff || true
scripts.reset-and-apply-patch: rm -rf app/electron-src && cp -R src/original app/electron-src && npm run apply-patch
scripts.clean: rm -rf app && rm -rf moba-shared && rm -rf src/original && rm -rf src/modified && rm -rf build-resources && rm -rf dist
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run extract && npm run create-patched-src && npm run apply-patch && npm run dist
